channel.title: Dot?
channel.description:
Is there a way to change the color of the Dots on map? Like Drops are red. Friends Green, Players White, you white square, and NPc yellow?
And could you make it so an account has no dot?

item.title: Dot?
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

I think that it’d have something to do with the client and how it displays the dots.
Also, you may have to do an “if playername ==” command or whatever for the blank

Just to get you on the right track

Read full topic
